meanings.definition: A person or group that brings civilization to a society.
meanings.sent1: The civilizers taught the people how to build homes and grow crops.
meanings.sent2: The ancient civilizers introduced writing and art to the community.
meanings.sent3: The civilizers organized a fun festival to celebrate the village's progress.
meanings.sent4: In the story, the civilizers were depicted as magical beings who transformed the land.
meanings.sent5: The image of the civilizers guiding the society towards progress stayed in everyone's minds.

meanings.definition: To bring civilization to a society.
meanings.sent1: The explorers aimed to civilize the new lands they discovered.
meanings.sent2: It is important to civilize through education and infrastructure development.
meanings.sent3: The group decided to civilize the remote island by teaching modern farming techniques.
meanings.sent4: She believed in the power of education to civilize even the most primitive societies.
meanings.sent5: Their mission was to civilize the wilderness and create a thriving community.
